title: Diamond and Emerald Nakshi Haar - Exquisite Bridal Statement
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features a durable Hyderabadi polish for lasting luster.
features: Intricate Nakshi work featuring floral motifs and paisley designs. The central pendant showcases a striking pear-shaped emerald, surrounded by diamonds. Delicate pearl drops add a touch of elegance. This haar utilizes a closely-set diamond pattern that ensures maximum sparkle. Traditional South Indian 'Addigai' inspired design.
colors: Golden base with sparkling white diamonds
and lustrous white pearls. The warmth of the gold complements the emerald's richness
occasions: and grand festivals. It can also be worn as a statement piece for upscale events and parties.
description: A stunning blend of tradition and luxury. The exquisite craftsmanship, high-quality diamonds, and vibrant emerald make this necklace a true heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability. This statement necklace will capture hearts and turn heads. It carries a rich cultural significance, symbolizing prosperity and happiness.
